{"id":1247128724,"question_id":2524,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1714628424,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1247128724/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Largest Positive Integer That Exists With Its Negative","memory":"44.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findMaxK(int[] nums) {\n        Set<Integer> set = new HashSet<>();\n        int max=Integer.MIN_VALUE;\n        for(int n : nums){\n            if(set.contains(-n)){\n                max =Math.max(max, n);\n                max =Math.max(max, -n);\n            }\n            set.add(n);\n        }\n\n        return max==Integer.MIN_VALUE ? -1 : max;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"largest-positive-integer-that-exists-with-its-negative","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
